mapper.select: select v.activityalias_ , v.businessstate_ , t1.id , t1.apply_year , t1.author , t1.releasedate , t1.last_update_date , t1.creation_date , t1.dept_deadline , t1.telephone , t1.dept , t1.form_remarks , t1.created_by , t1.version , t1.form_title , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_ip , t1.org_identity from dyn_recon_msg t1

select t1.id , t1.apply_year , t1.author , t1.releasedate , t1.last_update_date , t1.creation_date , t1.dept_deadline , t1.telephone , t1.dept , t1.form_remarks , t1.created_by , t1.version , t1.form_title , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_ip , t1.org_identity from dyn_recon_msg t1 where t1.id = #{id}

insert into dyn_recon_msg( id, apply_year, author, releasedate, last_update_date, creation_date, dept_deadline, telephone, dept, form_remarks, created_by, version, form_title, last_updated_by, last_update_ip, org_identity)
select #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.applyYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.author,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{item.releasedate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.lastUpdateDate}, #{item.creationDate}, #{item.deptDeadline,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dept,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{item.formRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.formTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orgIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual
mapper.update:
update dyn_recon_msg
id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_year =#{applyYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author =#{author,jdbcType=CLOB},
releasedate =#{releasedate,jdbcType=DATE},
last_update_date =#{lastUpdateDate},
creation_date =#{creationDate},
dept_deadline =#{deptDeadline,jdbcType=DATE},
telephone =#{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dept =#{dept,jdbcType=CLOB},
form_remarks =#{formRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_by =#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version =version+1,
form_title =#{formTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_updated_by =#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_update_ip =#{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_identity =#{orgIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id} and version =#{version}

update dyn_recon_msg set id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_year =#{applyYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author =#{author,jdbcType=CLOB}, releasedate =#{releasedate,jdbcType=DATE}, last_update_date =#{lastUpdateDate}, creation_date =#{creationDate}, dept_deadline =#{deptDeadline,jdbcType=DATE}, telephone =#{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept =#{dept,jdbcType=CLOB}, form_remarks =#{formRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by =#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version =version+1, form_title =#{formTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_updated_by =#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_ip =#{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_identity =#{orgIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id} and version =#{version}

update.foreach: update dyn_recon_msg set id =#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_year =#{item.applyYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author =#{item.author,jdbcType=CLOB}, releasedate =#{item.releasedate,jdbcType=DATE}, last_update_date =#{item.lastUpdateDate}, creation_date =#{item.creationDate}, dept_deadline =#{item.deptDeadline,jdbcType=DATE}, telephone =#{item.telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept =#{item.dept,jdbcType=CLOB}, form_remarks =#{item.formRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by =#{item.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version =version+1, form_title =#{item.formTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_updated_by =#{item.lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_ip =#{item.lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_identity =#{item.orgIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{item.id} and version =#{item.version};
